api_list.api_description: Search for items by name from the BGG database.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: The type of items to return.

api_list.template_response: XML with list of matching items

required_parameters.name: key
required_parameters.description: The key parameter from your manage link.

api_list.template_response: JSON list of alerts or error message

query: I am looking for the board game 'Catan' on BoardGameGeek. Can you also show me any existing price alerts I have set for games on CheapShark?
